name: Archery without Air
description:
You are an archer who ventures into a dungeon in search of loot... little did you know the dungeon was filled with carbon monoxide, a colorless, odorless, and poisonous gas. You must collect healing potions constantly to stay alive, while still collecting as much loot as possible.

Created for My First Game Jam Summer 2022.

By the way, I (the developer) am completely aware that this game, in its current state, is not in a finished state at all. The gameplay is an unbalanced mess, the artwork leaves much to be desired, and overall the game lacks features and polish. I plan to work much more on this game in the future, but for now, I need to have something to submit to the game jam.
